memories.learnmore.add-a-tag-text: 91.12605 Click on a photo, or type the name in “Who is in this memory” to add a tag. When you tag someone, you add the memory to that profile.
memories.learnmore.add-custom-tags-text: 91.12607 Add tags like “World War II” or “recipe” or “tailor” to make your memories more discoverable. Other FamilySearch users with the same interests will see what you’ve added.
memories.learnmore.alt-text.collection-o: 91.12608 An organized collection of photos, stories, documents, and audio files that have been bookmarked.
memories.learnmore.alt-text.favorite-fam: 91.12609 A computer screen showing that favorite family memories have been organized in the Memories Gallery.
memories.learnmore.alt-text.sharing-fami: 91.12610 People coming together and sharing family memories using different social media platforms and devices.
memories.learnmore.alt-text.walking-on-b: 91.12611 A family walking on the seashore. Their faces are identified by a thin white box to show that they are tagged.
memories.learnmore.celebrate-a-life-text: 91.12613 Add memories that help tell the story of an ancestor’s life. What you share will be preserved for generations to come in Family Tree.
memories.learnmore.cloud-image-alt-tag: 91.12614 A word cloud of potential topic tags in different languages.
memories.learnmore.create-account-button: 91.12615 Create a free account to start
memories.learnmore.create-slideshow-text: 91.12617 Arrange photos and photos with audio within an album, and share it. The album you share can be viewed one memory at a time or as a slideshow.
memories.learnmore.easily-find-memories-: 91.12619 Return easily to important memories and even albums that were added by others. It’s an easy way to rediscover photos and stories that are important to you.
memories.learnmore.explore-features-text: 91.12621 The following features will help you create a heritage collection of new and old family photos, stories, documents, and audio files.
memories.learnmore.keep-together-with-ga: 91.12622 Keep It All Together with the Gallery
91.12623 Upload, organize, and access all of your family treasures in the Gallery. Think of it as the control center for Memories.
memories.learnmore.make-connections-text: 91.12625 See who appreciates what you’ve added. Whenever a memory is bookmarked, FamilySearch (or Tree) adds the username of the person that found it valuable.
memories.learnmore.make-family-discoveri: 91.12627 Try searching Topic Tags and selecting Search only my close relatives. You may find memories about your own family that you didn’t know existed.
memories.learnmore.make-people-findable-: 91.12628 Make People Findable with Person Tags
91.12629 Tagging is how you identify the people captured in a memory. It takes just a minute, but once it’s tagged, it will be easier for family to find now and in the future in Family Tree.
memories.learnmore.memory-import-text: 91.12631 Add your family photos, stories, documents, and audio files. You can sort the view in the gallery to focus on any of the 4.
memories.learnmore.memory-management-tex: 91.12633 Organize and view your memories in albums. You can move memories to your archive, and create bookmarks for any special memories you want to easily find again.
memories.learnmore.multiselect-text: 91.12635 Perform tasks for multiple memories at once. This includes things like adding to albums, adding topic tags, or making memories public or private.
memories.learnmore.organize-album-text: 91.12637 Group Memories by person, family, event, or any other category. It’s a great way to capture the full story about an ancestor or family member’s life. Albums can contain all of the memory types—photos, stories, documents, and audio files—and can be ordered however you like.
memories.learnmore.search-by-topic-text: 91.12639 Assign a custom tag to several different memories to easily find them. Think of them as a shortcut to themes and topics you care about.
memories.learnmore.share-album-heading: 91.12640 Have You Ever Shared an Album?
memories.learnmore.share-album-text: 91.12641 Albums are a great way to combine and share Memories around things like people or events. The people you share with can enjoy your memories one by one or in a slideshow.
memories.learnmore.share-in-easy-ways-te: 91.12643 Share albums on most of the major social networks or through a link in email or a text message. Those who receive the link can view the contents of the album even if they don’t have an account yet.
memories.learnmore.share-with-relatives-: 91.12645 Tag a memory to share it with relatives. They’ll see it when they visit the ancestor’s profile. Newly tagged memories are also shared on their home pages.
memories.learnmore.shortcuts-to-memories: 91.12647 Bookmarks are links to memories and albums you want to revisit later. Bookmarks are stored in the Gallery.
memories.learnmore.topic-tags-heading: 91.12648 Explore the Power of Topic Tags
memories.learnmore.topic-tags-text: 91.12649 A Memories collection can grow quickly. A simple way to help you categorize and enjoy your family treasures is to use topic tags.
memories.overview.albums-feature-descrip: 91.12650 Add memories to an album, and choose the best order. Then share the album with others on major social networks or through a shared link.
memories.overview.billboard-heading: 91.12652 Everyone has extraordinary memories to share.
memories.overview.billboard-photo-alt-te: 91.12653 Father teaching his daughter to play the guitar and sharing a memory with her.
memories.overview.billboard-subheading: 91.12654 Yet, it’s so easy for precious family photos and stories to get tucked away and forgotten. Preserve them now so they can be treasured for generations to come.
memories.overview.bookmark-feature-descr: 91.12655 Add any memory or shared album on FamilySearch to your Bookmarks list, a collection in the Gallery. It’s a simple way to easily rediscover significant family memories others have shared.
memories.overview.create-account-long: 91.12657 Create a free account to start
memories.overview.discover-memories-head: 91.12660 Discover the memories others have about your family.
memories.overview.existing-features-head: 91.12662 Continue to enjoy our most popular features.
memories.overview.footer-call-to-action: 91.12663 Preserve and share your family memories. Create an account.
memories.overview.footer-sign-in-option: 91.12664 or <SignInButton>sign in</SignInButton> if you already have one.
memories.overview.gallery-feature-descri: 91.12665 The Memories Gallery is where all your important family photos, stories, documents, and audio recordings can be securely saved and then shared with other family members.
memories.overview.gallery-feature-headin: 91.12666 Enjoy your family memories in one place.
memories.overview.meta-description: 91.12669 Find, upload, and share photos of your ancestors with the FamilySearch ‘Photos and Stories’ feature. You can also create online albums of ancestors.
memories.overview.mobile-app-alt-text: 91.12670  Man getting interviewed and his story is being recorded on the FamilySearch memories app.
memories.overview.mobile-app-call-to-act: 91.12671 Save meaningful memories before it’s too late. Your family will be grateful for generations.
memories.overview.mobile-app-description: 91.12672 You never know when a classic or heartwarming family story or photo will present itself. Be ready with the FamilySearch Memories mobile app. It’s an easy way to capture new or old family photos as well as heirloom documents and audio stories.
memories.overview.mobile-app-heading: 91.12673 Capture family history as it happens
memories.overview.page-title: 91.12675 Genealogy Photos - Find Ancestor Photos | Family History Albums
memories.overview.person-tags-feature-de: 91.12676 Add a person tag to an ancestor in a photo, document, story, or audio recording to instantly share that memory with other relatives on the ancestor’s profile page in Family Tree.
memories.overview.slideshow-feature-desc: 91.12683 View photos or photos with audio in a slideshow. Share these on social media or at an event like a birthday party, wedding, or family reunion.
memories.overview.topic-tags-feature-des: 91.12685 Organize and share your favorite new and old family photos and memories with Topic Tags. They’ll also help you discover interesting photos that others have added on topics you care about.
